```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(dataforsocialscience)
# installs "remotes" and "apastats" if not already installed.
if (!require("apastats")) {
  if (!require("remotes")) {
    install.packages(
      "remotes",
      upgrade = "never",
      libs_only = TRUE,
      force = TRUE
    )
  }
  remotes::install_github(
    'achetverikov/apastats',
    subdir = 'apastats',
    upgrade = "never",
    libs_only = TRUE,
    force = TRUE
  )
}
```
